title: Smoked Salmon Pancakes
ingredients: ['300ml semi-skimmed milk', '180ml half-fat crème fraîche', '1 tsp lemon juice', '2 eggs', '4 spring onions, roughly chopped', '2 large sprigs of fresh dill', '250g self-raising flour', '125g smoked salmon trimmings, cut into fine strips', 'sunflower or light olive oil', '1 jar black lumpfish roe, about 50g (optional)', 'sprigs of fresh dill or snipped chives, to garnish']
